K10D0355_H0363:331a-1: mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa bstan pa'i mdo /
K10D0355_H0363:331a-3: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K10D0355_H0363:331a-4: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na dze ta'i tshal skyabs med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na /
K10D0355_H0363:331a-5: byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:331a-7: mi'i 'khor mang pos bskor nas chos ston cing bzhugs so //
K10D0355_H0363:331a-8: de nas dga' bos 'gro ba mang po'i don gyi
K10D0355_H0363:331a-9: phyir bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to
K10D0355_H0363:331a-11: de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rigs mthun pa'i nang 'dir skyes pa las bzang po yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331a-23: la la ni lo brgya lon nas 'chi ba yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331a-25: bcu lon nas 'chi ba yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331a-26: la la ni byad bzhin bzang yang dbul la /
K10D0355_H0363:331a-27: la la ni mi sdug pa la phyug pa yang
K10D0355_H0363:331a-28: mchis; nyams rtsal che ba ni ma rabs kyi nang
K10D0355_H0363:331a-29: na yang mchis / nyams rtsal chung la gral mtho ba yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331a-30: la la ni nyon mongs la tshe ring ba yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-0: la la ni @331b skyed cing tshe thung /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-1: la la ni legs par spyod pa las byur dang phrad /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-2: la la ni mi dge ba spyod pa la legs pa'i don du 'gyur ba yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-3: dkar zhing sha bzang la mi g-yo ba yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-4: la la ni sngo zhing gnag la mdangs dang ldan pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-5: la la ni lus chung zhing thung la snying rtsal dang ldan pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-6: la la ni che zhing ring yang gzhan gyi bran g-yog bgyid pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-7: la la ni bu tsha mang ba yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-8: la la ni rmongs pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-9: la la ni rtag par phyi rol tu 'khyam la bkres pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-10: la la ni pho brang gi nang na 'dug cing gos dang /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-11: zas kyis mi brel te longs spyod pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-12: gzhon na dbul zhing rgas na phyug cing btsan pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-13: drang dkan che zhing 'gal bar mi byed pa las gyod la thogs pa'ang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-15: bu ni sri zhu che ste /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-16: gtsug lag gi yi ge dang /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-17: gzhung smos shing bshad pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-18: spun mi mthun nas rtsod pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-19: gnas mtho zhing yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs su ldan pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-20: bdag gi khyim med la 'dron thabs su gnas pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-23: gcan gzan dang 'dra bar gnas pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:331b-24: gos su bal gos gon zhing zas su sha za zhing yi ge mi shes pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-0: mi g-yo bar 'dug kyang skyid cing yon tan thob pa yang @332a *//
K10D0355_H0363:332a-2: gla za zhing gnas pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-3: yid gzhungs shing khong grol ba yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-4: rmongs shing blun la ngan pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-5: btsal te ma rnyed pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-6: ma btsal te rnyed pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-7: phyug cing btsan la nor dang ldan la ser sna che ba yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-8: dbul la sbyin pa la sred pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-9: tshig smra na bden zhing mnyen par zer ba yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-10: tshig smra na gzer ba bzhin du zug pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-11: gzhan gyis byams shing bkur ba yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-12: kun gyis spangs shing bsrings pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-13: snying rje'i sems kyis sems can gso ba yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-14: bag med par srog gcod pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-15: khong yangs shing kun dang mthun pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-16: kun gyis mi 'dod pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-18: sgyug mor mi mthun pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-19: tshag pa mo dang mdza' ba yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-20: la la ni chos kyi gtam la dga' ba yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-21: la la ni mdo sde thos nas gnyid bro ba yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-22: la la ni brdal bag can la mdzangs pa yang mchis /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-23: la la ni gtsug lag khang la dga' zhing bsgom pa la 'grus so //
K10D0355_H0363:332a-24: la la ni byol song gi gzugs dang mtshungs /
K10D0355_H0363:332a-25: la la ni ri dvags rnam pa sna tshogs su 'gyur ba yang mchis na /
K10D0355_H0363:332b-0: 'bras bu rgyas @332b par bshad na 'khor mang po
K10D0355_H0363:332b-1: kun gyis thos nas sems rtse gcig tu dge ba'i
K10D0355_H0363:332b-2: rjes su phyogs par 'gyur lags so //
K10D0355_H0363:332b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0355_H0363:332b-5: khyod kyis ji ltar rnam par smin pa mi 'dra bar 'dri ba de bzhin du /
K10D0355_H0363:332b-6: de dag kun kyang tshe rabs snga ma la spyod
K10D0355_H0363:332b-7: pa mi mthun pas de'i phyir na khyad par sna
K10D0355_H0363:332b-9: de la da ltar byad bzhin bzang po ni bzod pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:332b-10: mi gdug pa ni zhe sdang dang /
K10D0355_H0363:332b-12: dbul phongs pa ni ser sna las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:332b-13: btsan zhing che ba ni sangs rgyas la gus par phyag btsal ba las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:332b-14: mi ma rabs thams cad ni rgyags shing dregs pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:332b-15: lus ring zhing bzang ba ni bkur sti byas pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:332b-16: lus thung ba ni chos la le lo byas pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:332b-17: blun po ni lug las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:332b-18: skam zhing gnag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsgribs pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:332b-19: mchu dma' ba ni chos ston pa'i zas la myangs pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:332b-20: mig tshag pa ni me bslangs pa mi ster ba las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:332b-21: mun sos nas mig mi mthong ba ni khra'i mig brus pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:332b-22: lkugs pa ni dam pa'i chos la skur ba 'debs pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:332b-23: 'on pa ni chos thos su mi dga' ba las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:332b-24: so sto ba ni rkang dang /
K10D0355_H0363:332b-25: rus pa la sred pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333a-0: sna gnyer ba ni spos mi @333a *//
K10D0355_H0363:333a-1: zhim pa bsregs te sangs rgyas la mchod pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333a-2: sho re ni nya'i mchu phug pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333a-3: skra ser ba ni phag gi spu gtogs pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333a-4: rna ba ral ba ni rna ba phug pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333a-5: thang sbrul 'dra ba ni gos mi gtsang ba gon te /
K10D0355_H0363:333a-6: sangs rgyas la snyogs pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333a-7: ngams gnag pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs khyim mam /
K10D0355_H0363:333a-8: khyams su bzhag pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333a-10: gyol po ni mkhan po dang /
K10D0355_H0363:333a-13: sgur ba ni gos mi gtsang ba gyon zhing /
K10D0355_H0363:333a-14: sangs rgyas kyi sku la rgyab kyis phyogs pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333a-15: dpral ba 'bur ba ni sangs rgyas mthong nas /
K10D0355_H0363:333a-16: phyag gus par mi 'tshal zhing lag pa dpral bar gtugs pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333a-17: mjing pa thung ba ni btsun pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:333a-18: bla ma mthong nas mgo smad cing byol ba las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333a-19: mchin pa na ba ni sems can gyi lus gtubs shing btsags pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333a-20: mdze can ni gzhan gyi nor ma 'os par blangs pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333a-21: lud pa mang ba ni dgun mi gzhan la zas grang mo byin pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333a-22: bu tsha med pa ni bya phrug mang po bsad pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333a-23: bu tsha mang ba ni sems can mang po gsos pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333a-24: tshe ring pa ni snying rje che ba las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333b-0: tshe thung ba ni srog gcod pa las 'ongs @333b
K10D0355_H0363:333b-1: so; ;phyug pa ni sbyin pa byas pa las 'ongs
K10D0355_H0363:333b-4: dkon mchog gsum la yon phul ba las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333b-5: dbang po rno ba ni slob pa la 'grus pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:333b-6: mdo sde kha ton du byas pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333b-7: rmun po ni byol song las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333b-9: bran mo byed pa ni bu lon ma gzhal ba las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333b-10: spro thung ba ni spre'u las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333b-11: yang mdze can ni dkon mchog gi rten bshig pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333b-12: yan lag ma tshang ba ni sems can gyi rkang lag bcad pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333b-15: dbang po drug tshang ba ni tshul khrims bsrungs pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333b-16: dbang po drug ma tshang ba ni /
K10D0355_H0363:333b-17: tshul khrims bshig pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333b-19: 'phags pa la ma mchod pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333b-21: rol mo la dga' ba ni /
K10D0355_H0363:333b-25: lba ba can ni snog pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333b-26: kha dman pa ni tshig rtsu ba mo smra ba las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333b-27: mtshan dang mi ldan pa ni khyi dang /
K10D0355_H0363:333b-29: rta'i 'bras bu bton pa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:333b-30: lce thung ba ni btsun pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:333b-31: bla ma la kha byas pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:333b-33: gzhan gyi chung ma la g-yem pa byas pa ni ngang mo dang /
K10D0355_H0363:334a-0: gnyen dgu la g-yo byas pa ni bye'u mchil @334a *//
K10D0355_H0363:334a-3: gtsug lag gi yi ge spyod cing ser sna sa
K10D0355_H0363:334a-4: gzhan la mi ston pa ni tshe'i dus byas nas
K10D0355_H0363:334a-6: mda' gzhu thog pa dang; rta zhon pa la dga' ba ni tshe phyi ma la 'phar ba dang /
K10D0355_H0363:334a-9: mgo rgyan btags pa la dga' ba ni /
K10D0355_H0363:334a-10: tshe phyi ma la srin bu mchu ring du skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334a-11: nyal zhing za ba la dga' ba ni tshe phyi ma la phag tu skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334a-12: dar tshon gyi gos la dga' ba ni bye'u khre'ur skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334a-13: mi snyan pa zlos shing ku re la dga' ba ni bya ne tso ru skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334a-14: phra ma byed pa la dga' ba ni /
K10D0355_H0363:334a-15: tshe phyi ma la lto 'phye mgo drug par skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334a-16: ma 'os par ku re byed pa la dga' ba ni /
K10D0355_H0363:334a-17: tshe phyi ma la srin bu rmongs par skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334a-18: gtam ngan skyel ba la dga' ba ni /
K10D0355_H0363:334a-19: tshe phyi ma la srin byar skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334a-21: ngan du dga' zhing gtam la sred pa ni tshe phyi ma la war skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334a-22: mi dngangs pa la dga' ba ni tshe phyi ma la srin bu do log tu skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334a-23: tshe snga ma la shing lham gyon zhing lha khang
K10D0355_H0363:334a-24: du 'gro ba ni tshe phyi ma la rtar skye'o
K10D0355_H0363:334a-25: // tshe snga ma la 'phyen bag med par btang bas ni tshe 'di la sbur bar skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334a-26: tshe snga ma la dge 'dun gyi rang 'thag dang /
K10D0355_H0363:334a-27: gtun la spyad pa ni tshe 'di la srin bu mgo rdebs su skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334a-28: sems can gyi zas la bgegs byas pa ni bya shing rta mor skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-0: tshe snga ma la dge 'dun gyi chu @334b brkus pas ni nya dang /
K10D0355_H0363:334b-1: rus sbal la sogs pa chu'i nang na gnas pa'i sems can du skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-2: tshe snga ma la dge 'dun sme bar byas pas ni gtsang sbra'i srin bur skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-3: dge 'dun gyi shing tog brkus pas ni mchin pa za ba'i srin bur skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-4: dge 'dun gyi nor brkus pas ni rang 'thag skor ba'i bong bu dang /
K10D0355_H0363:334b-6: dge 'dun gyi nor nan gyis bskyi brnya byas pas ni bya phug ron du skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-7: dge 'dun la spyo ba byas pas ni glang gi gnya' ba'i srin bur skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-8: dge 'dun gyi ldum skyur zos pas ni ldum bur rtsa ba gang gi srin bur skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-9: dge 'dun gyi khri stan la 'dug pas ni srin bu mgo dmar du skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-10: dge 'dun gyi nor sna tshogs la spyad pas ni srin bu 'phye bor skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-11: mgo la rus pa'i thur ma gtur nas lha khang du 'gro na bya mchu ring du skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-14: lha khang du 'gro na bya skyung kar skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-15: da lta tshon gyi gos gyon te /
K10D0355_H0363:334b-16: lha khang du 'gro na bye'u se rur skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-17: khyo shug zhag lon te lha khang du nyal na srin bu mgo sngon du skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mjug stegs 'cha' zhing 'dug pa ni rnga mor skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-20: 'bob gyon zhing gzhal med khang du 'gro na sbal bar skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-21: chos nyan pa'i tshe long gtam zer na bye'u lhan kar du skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:334b-22: dge slong khrims dag pa la mi gtsang bar bskyed pa ni /
K10D0355_H0363:335a-1: kyi sems can dmyal bar skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:335a-2: ral gri 'khor lo khri phrag brgya snyed du char
K10D0355_H0363:335a-3: ba lus kyi steng du 'bebs shing de'i lus gtubs
K10D0355_H0363:335a-4: par 'gyur ro // de nas dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0355_H0363:335a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gsungs pa de ltar
K10D0355_H0363:335a-6: dge 'dun gyi nor la spyod pa sdig lci bar
K10D0355_H0363:335a-7: gsungs te / gal te de ltar dge ba'i las la phyogs pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:335a-8: sbyin bdag la sogs pa ji ltar gtsug lag khang gi nang na bsti stang bgyid pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:335a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0355_H0363:335a-11: lha khang du 'gro ba la sems rnam pa gnyis yod de /
K10D0355_H0363:335a-14: de la ji ltar na dge ba'i sems zhes bya zhe na /
K10D0355_H0363:335a-15: lha khang du phyin pa'i tshe sangs rgyas mthong na phyag 'tshal zhing /
K10D0355_H0363:335a-16: dge 'dun la bkur sti byed cing /
K10D0355_H0363:335a-19: khrims nod dam sdig pa bshags pa'am /
K10D0355_H0363:335a-20: dkon mchog gsum gyi spyi nor la sogs pa gtong ngam /
K10D0355_H0363:335a-21: srog la'ang mi chags par dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa
K10D0355_H0363:335a-22: ni gom pa gcig por bas kyang lhar skye bar
K10D0355_H0363:335a-23: 'gyur ro // ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyim bdag tu zhugs te /
K10D0355_H0363:335a-24: de dang 'dra ba'i longs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:335a-25: de ni dge ba'i mchog dang ldan pa yin no //
K10D0355_H0363:335b-0: de @335b la gang mi dge ba ni lha khang du 'jug pa'i tshe /
K10D0355_H0363:335b-5: dge 'dun gyi zhal zas zos kyang tshim pa med cing /
K10D0355_H0363:335b-8: ldum skyur la sogs pa khyim du khyer ba de
K10D0355_H0363:335b-9: lta bu ni shin tu dmyal ba'i 'khor lo dang
K10D0355_H0363:335b-10: / shin tu 'bar ba dang; ral gri'i ri dang /
K10D0355_H0363:335b-11: ral gri'i shing la sogs pa'i dmyal bar shin tu sdug bsngal len par 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:335b-12: de ni mi dge ba'i mchog ces bya'o //
K10D0355_H0363:335b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0355_H0363:335b-15: khyod ma 'ongs pa'i tshe nga'i nye gnas rnams la
K10D0355_H0363:335b-16: dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor la ma spyod par 'dug
K10D0355_H0363:335b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ltar byas na /
K10D0355_H0363:335b-20: sangs rgyas byams pa 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i tshe gdon mi za bar grol lo //
K10D0355_H0363:335b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0355_H0363:335b-22: tshe 'di la gzhan gyi nor 'phrog na /
K10D0355_H0363:335b-23: tshe phyi ma la shin tu grang ba'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:335b-26: tshe 'di la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dang; mdo
K10D0355_H0363:335b-27: sde la mar me'i snang ba med par byed cing
K10D0355_H0363:335b-28: mi dge ba ni kho ra khor yug gi mun
K10D0355_H0363:335b-29: nag gi sems can dmyal bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:336a-0: tshe 'di la shan pa byed cing sems can @336a *//
K10D0355_H0363:336a-1: mang po'i srog gcod pa ni ral gri dang /
K10D0355_H0363:336a-2: ral gri nags tshal gyi sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:336a-4: khyi la sogs pa gtong zhing rngon pa byed pa
K10D0355_H0363:336a-5: la dga' ba ni lcags kyi sog le'i dmyal bar
K10D0355_H0363:336a-6: ltung ngo // tshe 'di la log par g-yem pa
K10D0355_H0363:336a-7: la dad pa che ba ni zangs kyi ka ba
K10D0355_H0363:336a-8: ltung ngo // dang / lcags kyi khrag gi sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:336a-9: tshe 'di la chung ma mang du blangs pa ni lcags kyi gtun gyi dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:336a-10: tshe 'di la bud med skyes pa dang mang du
K10D0355_H0363:336a-11: nyal ba ni sbrul gdug pa'i dmyal bar ltung ste
K10D0355_H0363:336a-12: / tshe 'di la bsreg cing btso ba'i thal ba 'babs pa'i dmyal bar ltung ste /
K10D0355_H0363:336a-13: tshe 'di la phag dang khyi'i spu gtogs pas ni shin tu bskol ba'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:336a-14: tshe 'di la phag dang khyi dang rta'i 'bras bu
K10D0355_H0363:336a-15: bton pas ni rdo zug rngu'i dmyal bar ltung ngo
K10D0355_H0363:336a-16: // tshe 'di la chang mang du 'thungs pas ni zangs khu 'thung ba'i dmyal bar skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:336a-17: tshe 'di la sems can gtubs shing dmyal bas ni lcags kyi 'khor lo'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:336a-18: tshe 'di la dge 'dun gyi shing tog brkus pa
K10D0355_H0363:336a-19: ni lcags kyi thu lum gyi dmyal bar ltung ngo
K10D0355_H0363:336a-21: phag gi rgyu ma zos pas ni mi gtsang ba'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:336b-0: tshe 'di la nya bshor bas ni ral @336b gri'i nags tshal gyi dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:336b-1: tshe 'di la ma yar mo byas te /
K10D0355_H0363:336b-2: snga ma'i bu la ner ba byed pa ni me'i shing dum gyi dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:336b-3: tshe 'di la dbyen byed pa ni lcags kyi gshol gyi dmyal bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:336b-4: tshe 'di la tshig ngan pas mi la spyo bas ni lce med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:336b-5: tshe 'di la rdzun zer ba ni lcags kyis gzer bus gzer ba'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:336b-6: tshe 'di la srog gcod cing lha'i srin la rjed
K10D0355_H0363:336b-7: pas ni lcags kyi bsnyung bu'i dmyal bar ltung ngo
K10D0355_H0363:336b-8: // tshe 'di la bon mo byed cing 'dre pos
K10D0355_H0363:336b-9: so zhes rdzun zer zhing nor len pa ni shal
K10D0355_H0363:336b-10: ma ri'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:336b-11: tshe 'di la bon byed cing mig btsums nas khyod
K10D0355_H0363:336b-12: kyi bla ma mchod 'os so zhes zer zhing slu
K10D0355_H0363:336b-13: ba ni rked par gtubs pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo
K10D0355_H0363:336b-14: // tshe 'di la bon byed cing srog gcod du
K10D0355_H0363:336b-15: bcug ste lha srin rjed du bcug pa ni sta
K10D0355_H0363:336b-16: res gtubs pa'i dmyal bar ltung ste /
K10D0355_H0363:336b-17: srung mas lus gtubs shing lcags kyi bya mchu can
K10D0355_H0363:336b-18: gyis mig gnyis kyi 'bras bu btsogs par 'gyur ro
K10D0355_H0363:336b-19: // tshe 'di la bon byed cing gshin rngog du 'dur ba dang /
K10D0355_H0363:336b-20: khang khyim bzang ngan lta ba dang /
K10D0355_H0363:336b-21: rigs lnga'i khams bde mi bde lta ba dang /
K10D0355_H0363:336b-22: glen pa bslus te nor mang du len pa ni lcags kyi dra bar bcug pa'i dmyal bar skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:337a-0: bya ma rungs pa grangs med pas lus kyi steng @337a *//
K10D0355_H0363:337a-1: du 'dug nas steng gi sha zad nas rus pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:337a-3: sdug bsngal mu med pa byed par 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:337a-4: tshe 'di la sman byed cing nad pa gso mi
K10D0355_H0363:337a-5: nus par rdzun gyis nor len pa ni lcags kyi
K10D0355_H0363:337a-6: thur mas btsugs pa'i dmyal bar ltung ste /
K10D0355_H0363:337a-7: lus la kun tu me 'bar ro //
K10D0355_H0363:337a-9: mchod rten bshig cing dge 'dun dang; pha ma dang /
K10D0355_H0363:337a-10: mkhan po la bag med par sri zhu chung ba
K10D0355_H0363:337a-11: ni mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen po
K10D0355_H0363:337a-13: de nas sems can dmyal ba chen po brgya sum cu rtsa drug gi nang du 'gro ste /
K10D0355_H0363:337a-14: la la ni bskal ba gcig /
K10D0355_H0363:337a-15: la la ni bskal ba gnyis /
K10D0355_H0363:337a-16: la la ni bskal ba lnga'i bar du 'gro ba nas /
K10D0355_H0363:337a-17: gzod mthar phyin nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad na ni /
K10D0355_H0363:337a-18: byang chub tu sems skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:337a-19: gal te ma phrad na slar yang sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:337a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0355_H0363:337a-21: mi lus bong che zhing gnag la spro thung ba
K10D0355_H0363:337a-22: 'gro ba la dga' ba ni rnga mo las 'ongs
K10D0355_H0363:337a-23: so // 'gro ba la sred la za ba la rngam ste /
K10D0355_H0363:337a-24: nyam nga ba la 'byol ba ni stag las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:337a-26: grang bas mi 'jigs shing gzugs che ba ni glang las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:337a-27: sgra che zhing 'dzem bag med la gang 'dod pa
K10D0355_H0363:337a-28: dam du 'dzin cing bzang ngan bye brag mi phyed
K10D0355_H0363:337b-0: pa ni @337b bong bu las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:337b-1: rtag tu sha la sred cing rngam ste 'jigs pa med pa ni seng ge las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:337b-2: lus ring zhing mig zlum la ri'am /
K10D0355_H0363:337b-3: dgon par shin tu 'gro la chung ma la sdang ba ni stag las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:337b-4: spu ring shing mig zlum ste gnas gcig tu mi dga' ba ni bya las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:337b-5: 'gyur ldog che zhing srin bu gsod pa la dga' ba ni wa las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:337b-6: dpa' bshor che zhing khrel 'dzem chung zhing chung ma dang /
K10D0355_H0363:337b-7: bu la sred pa ni spyang ki las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:337b-8: g-yon can gyis ngos 'dzin la gnyid chung la khro ba ni khyi las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:337b-9: khro ba la dga' zhing smra bar ni 'dod la
K10D0355_H0363:337b-10: mi kun gyis byams pa ni ne tso las 'ongs
K10D0355_H0363:337b-11: so // mang por 'dus shing smra ba la dga'
K10D0355_H0363:337b-12: zhing mya ngan mang ba ni bya khu byug las
K10D0355_H0363:337b-13: so // 'ongs so // bong chung zhing g-yem pa
K10D0355_H0363:337b-14: la dad che ste snying mi brtan pa ni byi'u
K10D0355_H0363:337b-16: mig tshag la spro thung la kha nas lbu ba
K10D0355_H0363:337b-17: 'ongs la nyal ba'i tshe na lus sbrid 'dod pa
K10D0355_H0363:337b-18: ni rtsangs pa las 'ongs so; ;smra na khro zhing
K10D0355_H0363:337b-19: pha rol gyi tshig mi go la khro la mi
K10D0355_H0363:337b-20: la gdug pa'i tshig 'byung ba ni sdig pa las
K10D0355_H0363:337b-21: 'ongs so // gcig tu 'dug cing za ba la
K10D0355_H0363:337b-22: brkam ste nub mo gnyid chung ba ni byi la
K10D0355_H0363:337b-23: 'ongs so // las 'ongs so // khyim phugs dang /
K10D0355_H0363:337b-24: rku ba la dad che ste gnyen ngo mi shes pa ni byi ba las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:337b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0355_H0363:337b-26: gang la la zhig gtsug lag khang dang /
K10D0355_H0363:338a-0: @338a *// mchod rten 'jig cing gang gis dkon mchog gsum gyi
K10D0355_H0363:338a-1: rdzas blangs shing spyad na tshe phyi ma la bstir
K10D0355_H0363:338a-2: med pa'i sems can dmyal bar skye ste /
K10D0355_H0363:338a-3: ci ste der skyes nas dmyal ba las thar na yang /
K10D0355_H0363:338a-15: gal te mir skyes na'ang ma ning dang /
K10D0355_H0363:338a-18: mtshan ma med pa spun pa sogs par skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:338a-19: mi zhe sdang che ba ni sbrul gdug pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:338a-26: khra la sogs pa thams cad du skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:338a-27: ci ste mi'i lus thob na'ang bya dang; phag gsod pa la dad cing rngon pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:338a-29: gti mug che zhing dge mi dge'i bye brag mi
K10D0355_H0363:338a-30: byed pa ni tshe phyi ma la bal glang dang
K10D0355_H0363:338a-39: grog ma la sogs par skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:338a-40: ci ste mi'i lus thob na'ang 'on pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:338a-44: sgur po la sogs par skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:338a-45: yan lag ma tshang ba dang /
K10D0355_H0363:338a-46: dbang po ma tshang ba'i lus su 'gyur te /
K10D0355_H0363:338a-47: chos la nan tan byed mi nus so //
K10D0355_H0363:338b-0: rgyags @338b shing dregs pa ni tshe phyi ma la mi gtsang ba'i nang gi srin bu dang /
K10D0355_H0363:338b-5: ci ste mi lus thob na'ang bran khol du skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:338b-6: dbul phongs te slong mo byed la thams cad kyis brnyas shing smad par 'ong ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:338b-7: gang dbang po yod pas bran du gzer zhing gzhan
K10D0355_H0363:338b-8: gyi nor la len pa ni tshe phyi ma la
K10D0355_H0363:338b-9: shal ma ri'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ste /
K10D0355_H0363:338b-10: sems can khri phrag brgyad stong snyed sos sha gcod cing za bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:338b-11: tshe 'di la pha rol po 'greng du mi dga'
K10D0355_H0363:338b-12: ba ni tshe phyi ma la ba lang gi lus
K10D0355_H0363:338b-13: su skye ste / rkang lag rengs shing nyal mi shes pas gnyid log tu med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:338b-14: tshe 'di la mchod ston zos pa'i nub mo zas
K10D0355_H0363:338b-15: zos na tshe phyi ma la 'dre ltogs su 'gyur
K10D0355_H0363:338b-16: ro // lo khri brgya stong gi bar du bza' ba dang /
K10D0355_H0363:338b-17: btung ba rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:338b-18: yan man du 'gro ba'i tshe tshigs thams cad du me 'bar ro //
K10D0355_H0363:338b-19: tshe de la sgren mor 'dug par dad pa ni spu nyung ba'i bya rtag tu 'bod par skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:338b-20: tshe 'di la mchod ston gyi zas zos kyi lhag
K10D0355_H0363:338b-21: ma khyim du khyer ba ni tshe phyi ma la
K10D0355_H0363:338b-22: lcags 'bar ba'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:338b-23: ci ste mir skyes na yang lkog nad can dang /
K10D0355_H0363:338b-25: tshe 'di la sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'i tshe
K10D0355_H0363:338b-26: dpral ba sa la ma gtugs na spyi'u tshugs kyi
K10D0355_H0363:339a-1: na'ang mi 'o cog gis brnyas shing slu bar skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:339a-2: tshe snga ma la sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba'i
K10D0355_H0363:339a-3: tshe thal mo mi sbyor ba ni tshe phyi ma
K10D0355_H0363:339a-5: las mang du byas te 'bras bu 'grub pa chung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:339a-6: tshe 'di la zhal ston nyal nas mi langs pa
K10D0355_H0363:339a-7: ni tshe phyi ma la lto 'phye'i ris su skye'o
K10D0355_H0363:339a-8: // lus ring zhing che ba ni srin bu pho mo thams cad kyis za bar 'ong ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:339a-9: tshe 'di la lag pa bsnol te sangs rgyas la
K10D0355_H0363:339a-10: phyag 'tshal ba ni tshe phyi ma la phyin ka
K10D0355_H0363:339a-11: log tu bcings pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo
K10D0355_H0363:339a-12: // mi ru skyes na'ang nye bar gyod la thogs par 'ong ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:339a-13: tshe 'di la thal mo sbyar te yan lag smad
K10D0355_H0363:339a-14: lnga sa la gtugs te rtse gcig pa'i sems kyis
K10D0355_H0363:339a-15: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba ni gang nas gang
K10D0355_H0363:339a-16: du skyes par rtag tu btsan zhing skyid par 'ong
K10D0355_H0363:339a-17: ngo // tshe 'di la 'khong zhing spro thung ba ni byol song las 'ongs so //
K10D0355_H0363:339a-18: tshe 'di la mig yon por 'dug pa ni gzhan
K10D0355_H0363:339a-19: gyi chung ma la mig zur gyis stegs pa las
K10D0355_H0363:339a-20: 'ongs so // tshe 'di la chung ma'i non byas
K10D0355_H0363:339a-21: te pha ma la rgol ba ni lce gtubs pa'i
K10D0355_H0363:339a-22: sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:339a-23: tshe 'di la chang gi dbang du sred pa ni tshe phyi ma la chu'i srin bur skye'o //
K10D0355_H0363:339a-24: ci ste mir skyes na'ang lha gor dang /
K10D0355_H0363:339a-25: dbugs mi bde ba'i nad kyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:339a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0355_H0363:339b-0: ngas ji ltar bshad @339b pa'i sdug bsngal mang po
K10D0355_H0363:339b-1: rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyis mi dge ba rnams
K10D0355_H0363:339b-2: la gyur te rab ni sems can dmyal bar ltung
K10D0355_H0363:339b-3: ngo // 'bring ni byol song gi rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:339b-4: tha ma ni yi dvags kyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:339b-5: srog gcod pas sems can ngan song gsum du ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:339b-6: ci ste mir skyes na'ang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te /
K10D0355_H0363:339b-8: nor thun mong du spyad pa'i dbang med do //
K10D0355_H0363:339b-9: mi tshangs par spyod pas kyang sems can ngan song gsum du ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:339b-10: ci ste mir skyes na'ang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te /
K10D0355_H0363:339b-11: bdag gi chung ma la 'phyo ba dang; chen chun gnyis rtsod pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:339b-12: bdag gi bsam pa bzhin mi 'grub bo //
K10D0355_H0363:339b-13: rdzun du smra ba'ang sems can ngan song gsum du ltung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:339b-14: ci ste mir skyes na'ang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te /
K10D0355_H0363:339b-15: gzhan gyis skur pa 'debs pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:339b-16: ma 'ongs pa kun gyis slu bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:339b-17: phra ma byed pa'ang sems can ngan song gsum du ltung bar byed do //
K10D0355_H0363:339b-18: ci ste mir skyes na'ang gnyen zhig pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:339b-21: ngag mi snyan par smra na'ang sems can ngan song gsum du ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:339b-22: ci ste mir skyes na'ang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te /
K10D0355_H0363:339b-23: rtag tu sgra mi snyan pa mang po thos pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:339b-24: smras so cog skyon can rtsod par 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:340a-0: tshig kyal pa byed pa'ang ngan song @340a *//
K10D0355_H0363:340a-2: ci ste mir skyes na'ang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te /
K10D0355_H0363:340a-3: bden pa'i tshig smras pa'ang kun gyis yid mi ches pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:340a-4: smras pa thams cad mi gsal bar 'ong ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:340a-5: 'dod chags kyi kha na ma tho ba yang sems can ngan song gsum du lhung bar byed do //
K10D0355_H0363:340a-6: ci ste mir skyes na'ang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te /
K10D0355_H0363:340a-7: nor la chags shing chog mi shes pa'i rang bzhin dang /
K10D0355_H0363:340a-8: mang du tshol yang bsam pa bzhin mi 'grub bo //
K10D0355_H0363:340a-9: zhe sdang gi kha na ma tho ba'ang sems can ngan song gsum du ltung bar byed do //
K10D0355_H0363:340a-10: ci ste mir skyes na'ang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te /
K10D0355_H0363:340a-11: gzhan gyis rtag tu glags tshol ba dang /
K10D0355_H0363:340a-12: rtag tu gzhan gyis 'tshe bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:340a-13: log par lta ba'i kha na ma tho ba'ang sems can ngan song gsum du ltung ngo //
K10D0355_H0363:340a-14: ci ste mir skyes na'ang 'bras bu rnam pa gnyis smin te /
K10D0355_H0363:340a-15: rtag par log par lta ba'i khyim du skye ba dang /
K10D0355_H0363:340a-16: g-yon can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:340a-18: de lta bu'i mi dge ba bcu ni sdug bsngal mang pos gdungs pa'i rgyu yin no //
K10D0355_H0363:340a-19: de nas 'khor mang po'i nang nas mi dge ba
K10D0355_H0363:340a-20: bcu'i las kyi lam byed pa dag bcom ldan 'das
K10D0355_H0363:340a-21: kyis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal rnams bshad pa
K10D0355_H0363:340a-22: 'di thos nas thams cad kyis cho nges btab ste
K10D0355_H0363:340b-0: / bcom ldan 'das la 'di @340b skad ces gsol to //
K10D0355_H0363:340b-1: bdag cag rnams kyis dge ba ji lta bu zhig
K10D0355_H0363:340b-2: gis sdug bsngal de dag las ji ltar thar bar
K10D0355_H0363:340b-3: 'gyur / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0355_H0363:340b-4: khyed rnams sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi las mthun par gyis shig /
K10D0355_H0363:340b-5: ji ltar na bsod nams byed ce na /
K10D0355_H0363:340b-6: gang la la zhig bdag nyid kyi sems can gyi
K10D0355_H0363:340b-7: don chen po byed pa gtso bor byas pa la
K10D0355_H0363:340b-8: mchod rten dang / gtsug lag khang brtsigs na ma 'ongs pa'i dus na /
K10D0355_H0363:340b-9: gdon mi za bar rgyal por 'gyur te /
K10D0355_H0363:340b-10: 'gro ba mang po'i don byed cing 'gro'o cog gi kun la mi mthun pa med do //
K10D0355_H0363:340b-11: tshe 'di la chos kyi 'gro ba dang /
K10D0355_H0363:340b-12: chos la dad pa ni mi'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:340b-13: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gdon mi za bar blon che'am /
K10D0355_H0363:340b-14: khams kyi dbang blon du 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:340b-16: rta dang ldan zhing dgos so cog tshogs par 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:340b-17: tshe 'di la mi mang po la btud cing bsod
K10D0355_H0363:340b-18: nams byed pa ni phyug cing btsan pa'i khyim bdag
K10D0355_H0363:340b-19: tu 'gyur te / mang po kun gyis bkur ba dang /
K10D0355_H0363:340b-20: phyogs bzhi dag tu 'gro'ang bgegs med cing bya'o cog 'grub bo //
K10D0355_H0363:340b-21: tshe 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdun du me mar
K10D0355_H0363:340b-22: 'bud cing snang gsal la dad pa ni ma 'ongs
K10D0355_H0363:340b-23: pa'i dus na / nyi ma dang /
K10D0355_H0363:340b-25: 'od kyis bdag la gsal bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:341a-0: tshe 'di la snying rje'i sems kyi sbyin pa sbyin na ma 'ongs pa'i dus @341a *//
K10D0355_H0363:341a-1: na; rab tu phyug cing zas dang /
K10D0355_H0363:341a-2: gos kyang yid bzhin du 'grub bo //
K10D0355_H0363:341a-3: tshe 'di la zas skom mi la sbyin pa la
K10D0355_H0363:341a-4: dga' ba ni gar skyes pa thams cad yid bzhin
K10D0355_H0363:341a-5: gyi zas su 'gyur zhing zas dang /
K10D0355_H0363:341a-6: skom yang ldan la dbang po rno zhing spobs pa che ste tshe ring bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:341a-7: gang gis byol song la zas byin na ni lan brgya 'gyur 'thob bo //
K10D0355_H0363:341a-8: log sred la sbyin pa sbyin pas ni lan stong 'gyur 'thob bo //
K10D0355_H0363:341a-11: khrims gtsang ma la sbyin pa byin pas ni lan khrir 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:341a-12: chos smra ba'i dge slong theg pa chen po spel zhing /
K10D0355_H0363:341a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gter bshad pa mang po kun
K10D0355_H0363:341a-14: gyi mig phyed nus pa la byin na lan grangs
K10D0355_H0363:341a-15: med tshad med pa snyed do //
K10D0355_H0363:341a-17: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la byin na 'bras bu mthar gtugs par 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:341a-19: sbyin gnas gsum la sbyin pa byas na rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu de mi shes so //
K10D0355_H0363:341a-24: de dag la zas gcig sbyin pa byas pas kyang
K10D0355_H0363:341a-25: de lta bu'i 'bras bu mi zad pa 'thob par
K10D0355_H0363:341a-26: 'gyur na / rtag tu sbyin pa byin pa lta ci smos /
K10D0355_H0363:341a-27: tshe 'di la dge 'dun mang po la khrus byas
K10D0355_H0363:341a-28: na skye ba thams cad du byad bzhin bzang zhing
K10D0355_H0363:341b-0: / yid bzhin gyi gos dang ldan la mang po kun gyis bkur @341b bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:341b-1: tshe 'di la dam pa'i chos kyis mdo sde klog pa dang /
K10D0355_H0363:341b-2: 'don pa la bsngags pas ni skye ba thams cad
K10D0355_H0363:341b-3: du sgra dbyangs snyan cing kun gyis thos par dga'
K10D0355_H0363:341b-4: bar 'gyur ro // tshe 'di la tshul khrims sdom
K10D0355_H0363:341b-5: pas ni skye ba thams cad du byad bzhin bzang
K10D0355_H0363:341b-6: bar 'gyur ro // ba dang / mi'i mchog tu 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:341b-7: tshe 'di la chu dkon pa'i sar khron pa mang po brkos la skom sbyar la /
K10D0355_H0363:341b-8: lam srang du kun shong bar byed de bskyed cing
K10D0355_H0363:341b-9: mi'o cog sgrol ba ni skye ba thams cad du
K10D0355_H0363:341b-10: mi'i rgyal po byed cing zas skom ro brgya dang
K10D0355_H0363:341b-11: ldan pa yid bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:341b-12: tshe 'di la mdo sde la sogs pa 'dri'am /
K10D0355_H0363:341b-13: gzhan la byin te klog tu bcug pa ni skye
K10D0355_H0363:341b-14: ba thams cad du tshig la thogs pa med cing
K10D0355_H0363:341b-15: slob pa thams cad lan gcig thos pas mi brjed
K10D0355_H0363:341b-18: byang chub sems dpa' yang rtag tu de la dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:341b-23: gru la sogs pa byed de skye bo mang po
K10D0355_H0363:341b-24: sgrol bar byed pa la dga' ba ni skye ba
K10D0355_H0363:341b-25: thams cad du rin po che sna bdun dang ldan
K10D0355_H0363:341b-26: zhing phal mang pos bkur te bsngags so //
K10D0355_H0363:341b-27: 'gro zhing 'ong ba la bsu bskyal bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0355_H0363:341b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0355_H0363:341b-30: ji ltar ngas mdo sde thams cad las rgyu dang /
K10D0355_H0363:342a-5: sdug bsngal las grol bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
K10D0355_H0363:342a-6: gang la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di la skur
K10D0355_H0363:342a-7: pa 'debs pa ni tshe 'di nyid la'ang lce rtsa
K10D0355_H0363:342a-10: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10D0355_H0363:342a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0355_H0363:342a-16: mdo sde 'di ni dge ba dang /
K10D0355_H0363:342a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang /
K10D0355_H0363:342a-20: spyod pa zhes kyang bya ste /
K10D0355_H0363:342a-22: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde 'di bshad pa na 'khor mang po'i nang du lha dang /
K10D0355_H0363:342a-23: mi brgyad khri snyed bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
K10D0355_H0363:342a-24: bud med brgyad stong snyed ni mo'i lus las phor gyur te /
K10D0355_H0363:342a-25: mi dge ba'i sems can thams cad kyang dge bar gyur to //
